item.title: EP 671 - The Waves Swallow All Souls
item.itunes:title: The Waves Swallow All Souls
item.description:
Today we drive very carefully around a dirty road, learn the painful truth, and then we investigate a mysterious airplane crash in the middle of the ocean!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Today’s artwork is from Rudie Jazz!

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

https://katu.com/news/local/someone-dumping-bags-of-human-feces-along-rural-multnomah-co-roads-its-outrageous

Chronic Opioid Use for Pain Management – How it REALLY Affects the Body

https://www.h-wave.com/blog/chronic-opioid-use-for-pain-management-how-it-affects-the-body/

Brain Atrophy with Chronic Pain: A Call for Enhanced Treatment

https://tinyurl.com/rpvbspd6

Chronic Pain on the Brain: 4 Psychological Effects of Living With Pain

https://www.h-wave.com/blog/chronic-pain-on-the-brain-psychological-effects-of-living-with-pain/

Transatlantic C-124 Flight (Fortean Map)

https://tinyurl.com/4h27sj76

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1951_Atlantic_C-124_disappearance
